name: static-site-template
description: A static site template using metalsmith.

scripts.copy:assets: shx mkdir -p dist/ && cp -r src/assets/* dist/
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && (npm run build:metalsmith && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets)
scripts.dev: bash -c "(npm run server & npm run watch)"
scripts.start: bash -c "(npm run build:all && npm run server)"

author: Julius Rajala
